TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit XamlLanguage extends System.Object
public ref class XamlLanguage abstract sealed

summary.span: 定義常數，這些常數提供對 XAML 標記或 XAML 型別程式設計很有用的字串或物件。

span.span: Defines constants that provide strings or objects that are useful for XAML markup or for programming with XAML types.

summary.span: 這些字串或物件與 XAML 語言概念有關、與 .NET Framework XAML 服務中實作的 XAML 語言概念有關，或與兩者都有關。

span.span: These strings or objects are relevant to XAML language concepts, to the implementation of XAML language concepts in .NET Framework XAML Services, or to both.

remarks.format: ## Remarks API 會傳回維持為內部 XAML 結構描述內容為基礎的查詢結果。The API returns lookup results that are based on a XAML schema context that remains internal. 在此結構描述內容中是`true`。In this schema context, is `true`. 否則，XAML 結構描述內容報告為預設的.NET Framework XAML 服務及其定義的 XAML 讀取器和 XAML 寫入器會使用預設設定。Otherwise, the XAML schema context that is reported as the default for .NET Framework XAML Services and its defined XAML readers and XAML writers uses default settings. 整體來說，使用預先定義的 XAML 讀取器和 XAML 寫入器的 XAML 結構描述內容根據相同可從應用程式開發介面的設定或傳回的執行個體。Overall, the XAML schema context that is used for predefined XAML readers and XAML writers is based on the same instance that is available from APIs that set or return a . .NET Framework XAML 服務的預設 XAML 結構描述內容為基礎 CLR 概念 」 和 「 反映。The default XAML schema context for .NET Framework XAML Services is based on CLR concepts and reflection. 預設 CLR 支援的辨識項可以找到時取得特定屬性都和檢查時。Evidence of the default CLR backing can be found when obtaining certain properties that are a and when checking . 同樣地，屬性都有 CLR 反映型的值。Similarly, properties that are a have CLR reflection-based values for .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AllDirectives As ReadOnlyCollection(Of XamlDirective)

summary.span: 取得 .NET Framework XAML 服務所定義之各個 識別項的唯讀泛型集合。

span.span: Gets a read-only generic collection of each identifier that is defined by .NET Framework XAML Services.

value.span: .NET Framework XAML 服務所定義之各個 識別項的唯讀泛型集合。

span.span: A read-only generic collection of each identifier that is defined by .NET Framework XAML Services.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AllTypes As ReadOnlyCollection(Of XamlType)

summary.span: 取得個別 值的唯讀泛型集合，這些值符合或別名化由 .NET Framework XAML 服務定義的 XAML 語言本質。

span.span: Gets a read-only generic collection of individual values that match, or alias, a XAML language intrinsic that is defined by .NET Framework XAML Services.

value.span: 符合 XAML 語言本質之各個 的唯讀泛型集合。

span.span: A read-only generic collection of each that matches a XAML language intrinsic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.2](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)的內建 XAML 語言的資訊項目清單。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525) for a list of intrinsic XAML language information items. 請注意，並非所有的項目列為 5.2 的各小節會實作為。Note that not all items that are listed as subsections of 5.2 are implemented as a . 例如，`x:Code`不是型別。For example, `x:Code` is not a type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Arguments As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ Arguments { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 做為 Factory 方法的 或用於一般用途。

span.span: Gets a for the of a factory method or a generic usage.

value.span: ，做為 Factory 方法的 或用於一般用途。

span.span: A for the of a factory method or generic usage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Factory 方法，是[!INCLUDE[xaml2009](~/includes/xaml2009-md.md)]來識別替代方法來建構將 XAML 類型的基礎類型的功能。A factory method is a [!INCLUDE[xaml2009](~/includes/xaml2009-md.md)] feature for identifying an alternative technique that constructs the underlying type for a XAML type. `Arguments`指定輸入的 factory 方法，並啟用在標記中指定該資訊。The `Arguments` specify the input of a factory method and enable specifying that information in markup. 不存在的 factory 方法，文中的預設技術是要嘗試尋找預設的建構函式，並嘗試尋找類型、 成員或目的類型識別的型別轉換子。The default techniques, in absence of a factory method, are to attempt to find a default constructor and then attempt to find an identified type converter for type, member, or destination type. 對於一般的使用方式，`Arguments`包裝的物件或指定為所需的所有建構輸入初始化文字`TypeArguments`。For the generic usage, the `Arguments` wrap the objects or initialization text of all construction inputs that are specified as necessary for the `TypeArguments`.

summary.span: 取得 ，以識別 XAML 的 Factory 方法。

span.span: Gets a that identifies a factory method for XAML.

value.span: ，識別 XAML 的 Factory 方法。

span.span: A that identifies a factory method for XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Factory 方法，是[!INCLUDE[xaml2009](~/includes/xaml2009-md.md)]來識別替代方法來建構將 XAML 類型的基礎類型的功能。A factory method is a [!INCLUDE[xaml2009](~/includes/xaml2009-md.md)] feature for identifying an alternative technique that constructs the underlying type for a XAML type. 預設的技術，如果無法使用的 factory 方法，是嘗試尋找預設的建構函式，然後再嘗試尋找類型、 成員或目的型別上的已識別的型別轉換子。The default technique, if a factory method is unavailable, is to try to find a default constructor, and then try to find an identified type converter on type, member, or destination type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property FieldModifier As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ FieldModifier { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 XAML 中之 指示詞的 。

span.span: Gets a for the directive from XAML.

value.span: XAML 中之 指示詞的 。

span.span: A for the directive from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.3.10](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.10](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Initialization As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ Initialization { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 XAML 中之 指示詞的 。

span.span: Gets a for the directive from XAML.

value.span: XAML 中之 指示詞的 。

span.span: A for the directive from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個指示詞代表 XAML 節點或 XAML 資訊集的初始文字表示物件項目內的字串提供周圍的物件項目型別建構資訊的位置。This directive represents the XAML node or XAML information set representation of initialization text, where a string within an object element supplies the type construction information for the surrounding object element. 如果您正在查看原始節點的解譯或視覺效果，`Initialization`有時候會出現在字串的形式`_Initialization`（請注意前置底線），且是在 XAML 語言 XAML 命名空間 (如表示前面`Namespace`節點)。If you are looking at raw node interpretations or visualizations, `Initialization` is sometimes seen in string form as `_Initialization` (note the leading underscore) and is within the XAML language XAML namespace (as notated by a preceding `Namespace` node). 在 [MS-XAML]，這個概念描述標題底下`x:InitializationText`。In [MS-XAML], this concept is described under the heading `x:InitializationText`. 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段版本低於 5.3.3](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.3](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Items As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ Items { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 XAML 中之 指示詞的 。

span.span: Gets a for the directive from XAML.

value.span: XAML 中之 指示詞的 。

span.span: A for the directive from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Items`指示詞是周圍的物件內的多個物件值的節點表示包裝函式。An `Items` directive is a node representation wrapper around multiple object values within a surrounding object. 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段第 5.3.1 章](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.1](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525). 如果您檢查未經處理的 XAML 節點資料流解譯或視覺效果，`Items`有時候會出現在字串的形式`_Items`（請注意前置底線），且是在 XAML 語言 XAML 命名空間 (如表示前面`Namespace`節點)。If you examine raw XAML node stream interpretations or visualizations, `Items` is sometimes seen in string form as `_Items` (note the leading underscore) and is within the XAML language XAML namespace (as notated by a preceding `Namespace` node).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Key As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ Key { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

value.span: XAML 中之 指示詞的 。

span.span: A for the directive from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`Key`指示詞會用於字典中的物件。A `Key` directive is used for objects in a dictionary. 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.3.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).

value.span: 型別的 ，這個型別是 的項目型別。

span.span: A for the type that is the item type of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在.NET Framework XAML 服務實作中， `Member` 受到。In the .NET Framework XAML Services implementation, the `Member` is backed by .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Members As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ Members { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 XAML 中之 概念的 。

span.span: Gets a for the concept in XAML.

value.span: XAML 中之 概念的 。

span.span: A for the concept in XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Members` [MS-XAML] 中未明確定義概念。The `Members` concept is not specifically defined in [MS-XAML]. `Members` 是相對於參考支援類型本身，標記中定義的型別成員的概念。`Members` is a concept for defining members of types in markup itself, as opposed to referencing backing types. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Name As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ Name { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 XAML 中之 指示詞的 。

span.span: Gets a for the directive from XAML.

value.span: XAML 中之 指示詞的 。

span.span: A for the directive from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`Name`指示詞用於標記中物件的識別碼。A `Name` directive is used for identifiers of objects in markup. 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.3.4](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.4](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525). 雖然這個概念的`Name`不完全一致的使用中指定 [MS-XAML]，您通常可以使用`Name`指示詞或`Name`提供 XAML 標記中的物件之間的概念連接屬性XAML 所建立的執行階段表示和處理的標記。Although this concept of `Name` is not completely consistent with the use that is specified in [MS-XAML], you can typically use the `Name` directive or the `Name` attribute to provide a conceptual connection between XAML objects in markup and the run-time representations that are created by XAML processing of the markup. 取決於此使用方式的特定架構上實作其將 XAML 整合到他們的一般物件模型的程式設計模型。This use depends on how specific frameworks implement their programming models to integrate XAML into their general object models. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[X:name 指示詞](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md)。For more information, see [x:Name Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Null As XamlType
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlType ^ Null { System::Xaml::XamlType ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 或 XAML 語言本質的 。

span.span: Gets a for the or XAML language intrinsic.

value.span: A如 / XAML 語言內建函式。

span.span: A for the / XAML language intrinsic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 XAML 類型提供 null 值的標記中的物件值。This XAML type provides null values for object values in markup. XAML 型別是 （或必須） 指派給`MarkupExtension`。The XAML type is (or must be) assignable to `MarkupExtension`. 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.2.4](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.4](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Object As XamlType
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlType ^ Object { System::Xaml::XamlType ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 XAML 語言概念的 。

span.span: Gets a for the XAML language concept.

value.span: XAML 語言概念的 。

span.span: A for the XAML language concept.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定 XAML`x:Object`特殊語言概念。XAML specifies `x:Object` as a special language concept. 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.2.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property PositionalParameters As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ PositionalParameters { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 XAML 中之 指示詞的 。

span.span: Gets a for the directive from XAML.

value.span: XAML 中之 指示詞的 。

span.span: A for the directive from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `PositionalParameters` 已包裝可指定為一組輸入標記延伸的物件節點的多個物件的指示詞。`PositionalParameters` is a directive that wraps the multiple objects that can be specified as a set of object nodes for input of a markup extension. 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 6.6.7](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 6.6.7](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525). 如果您正在查看原始節點的解譯或視覺效果，`PositionalParameters`有時候會出現在字串的形式`_PositionalParameters`（請注意前置底線），且是在 XAML 語言 XAML 命名空間 (如表示前面`Namespace`節點)。If you are looking at raw node interpretations or visualizations, `PositionalParameters` is sometimes seen in string form as `_PositionalParameters` (note the leading underscore) and is within the XAML language XAML namespace (as notated by a preceding `Namespace` node).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Property` 是一種特殊的形式的 XAML 型別會被識別為。`Property` is a specialized form of the XAML type that is identified as .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Reference As XamlType
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlType ^ Reference { System::Xaml::XamlType ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得表示 XAML 之 的 。

span.span: Gets a that represents a for XAML.

value.span: 表示 XAML 之 的 。

span.span: A that represents a for XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Reference` 是[!INCLUDE[xaml2009](~/includes/xaml2009-md.md)]來參考另一個物件節點，在標記中的功能。`Reference` is a [!INCLUDE[xaml2009](~/includes/xaml2009-md.md)] feature for referencing another object node in the markup. .NET Framework XAML 服務實作位於。The implementation for .NET Framework XAML Services is found in .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Shared As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ Shared { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 XAML 之 指示詞的 。

span.span: Gets a for the directive for XAML.

value.span: XAML 之 指示詞的 。

span.span: A for the directive for XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`Shared`指示詞 (當設定為`true`) 指定字典中找到項目時，物件的參考應該永遠傳回單一物件，而不是的新執行個體。A `Shared` directive (when it is set to `true`) specifies that when an item is found in a dictionary, references to the object should always return the singleton instead of a new instance. 此行為相關的概念，字典可能會用於做為來源的共用的內容或範本機制的特定使用 XAML 的架構。This behavior is related to the concept that a dictionary might be used as a source for a shared content or template mechanism by particular frameworks that use XAML. `Shared` 未指定 [MS-XAML] 中，但屬於`x`WPF 和.NET Framework 中的 xaml 命名空間定義的行為版本 3.0 和 3.5 版。`Shared` is not specified in [MS-XAML] but is part of the `x` namespace–defined behavior for XAML in WPF and .NET Framework version 3.0 and version 3.5.

public: static property System::Xaml::XamlType ^ Static { System::Xaml::XamlType ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 / XAML 語言本質的 。

span.span: Gets a for the / XAML language intrinsic.

value.span: A如 / XAML 語言內建函式。

span.span: A for the / XAML language intrinsic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 XAML 類型提供之支援成員所在的靜態成員的標記值。This XAML type provides values for markup where the backing member is a static member. XAML 型別是 （或必須） 指派給`MarkupExtension`。The XAML type is (or must be) assignable to `MarkupExtension`. 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.2.2 章](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.2](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).

summary.span: 取得 XAML 中之 指示詞的 。

value.span: XAML 中之 指示詞的 。

span.span: A for the directive from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.3.8](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.8](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SynchronousMode As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ SynchronousMode { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得啟用非同步 XAML 載入模式的 (如果 XAML 處理器支援這種模式的話)。

span.span: Gets a that enables loading XAML asynchronously if the XAML processor supports such a mode.

value.span: 啟用非同步 XAML 載入模式的 。

span.span: A that enables loading XAML asynchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`SynchronousMode`指示詞 (當設定為`Async`) 用來指定，當載入 XAML 檔案時，會先處理根節點。A `SynchronousMode` directive (when set to `Async`) is used to specify that when a XAML file is loaded, the root node is processed first. 可以插入結果的物件，即使仍在處理其內容。The resulting object can be inserted even though its content is still processing. 在此模式中，您可以略過工作最深的節點從根目錄的預設 XAML 處理行為。In this mode you can bypass the default XAML processing behavior of working from deepest node to the root. 在預設的 xaml 處理邏輯，正在等候根物件的任何呼叫端會封鎖直到完成完整的剖析。In the default processing logic for XAML, any caller that is waiting for the root object is blocked until the full parse is complete. `SynchronousMode` 未指定 [MS-XAML] 中，但屬於`x`命名空間定義中的行為 xaml WPF 在.NET Framework 3.5 版 SP1 （或任何後續的 service pack） 中的開頭。`SynchronousMode` is not specified in [MS-XAML] but is part of the `x` namespace–defined behavior for XAML in WPF beginning in .NET Framework version 3.5 with SP1 (or any subsequent service pack).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property TimeSpan As XamlType
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlType ^ TimeSpan { System::Xaml::XamlType ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 XAML 語言中之 概念的 。

span.span: Gets a for the concept in XAML language.

value.span: XAML 語言概念的 。

span.span: A for the XAML language concept.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段第 5.2.16](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.16](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525). `TimeSpan` 不是 true，內建函式，但因為它是常用的類型，XAML 規格中已指定。`TimeSpan` is not a true intrinsic, but was specified in the XAML specification because it is a commonly used type. XAML 規格作者視為有用標準化衍生詞彙中的 XAML 表示法。The XAML specification authors considered it useful to standardize the XAML representation in derived vocabularies. 另請參閱[通用 XAML 語言基本類型的類型內建](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/built-in-types-for-common-xaml-language-primitives.md)。See also [Built-in Types for Common XAML Language Primitives](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/built-in-types-for-common-xaml-language-primitives.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Type As XamlType
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlType ^ Type { System::Xaml::XamlType ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 / XAML 語言本質的 。

span.span: Gets a for the / XAML language intrinsic.

value.span: A如 / XAML 語言內建函式。

span.span: A for the / XAML language intrinsic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個 XAML 型別提供使用來自，繫結的值和查閱，支援類型系統。This XAML type provides values that use bindings from, and lookups to, a backing type system. XAML 型別是 （或必須） 指派給`MarkupExtension`。The XAML type is (or must be) assignable to `MarkupExtension`. 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.2.3](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.3](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property TypeArguments As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ TypeArguments { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 XAML 中之 指示詞的 。

span.span: Gets a for the directive from XAML.

value.span: XAML 中之 指示詞的 。

span.span: A for the directive from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`TypeArguments`指示詞指定的泛型類型條件約束，一般會指定為 XAML 物件時。A `TypeArguments` directive specifies the type constraints of a generic when a generic is specified as a XAML object. 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.3.11](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.11](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Uid As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ Uid { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 XAML 中之 指示詞的 。

span.span: Gets a for the directive from XAML.

value.span: XAML 中之 指示詞的 。

span.span: A for the directive from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`Uid`指示詞指定的 XAML 標記元素的唯一識別碼。A `Uid` directive specifies a unique identifier for a XAML markup element. 嚴格來說，這類的唯一識別碼無法套用至多種用途，在實作 XAML 的架構中。Strictly speaking, such a unique identifier could be applied to several purposes within a XAML-implementing framework. `Uid` 不同於`Name`在於`Name`具有特定角色中 [MS-XAML] 定義的宣告存在物件圖形輸出 XAML 來源中的識別項，而`Uid`有沒有特定的角色。`Uid` differs from `Name` in that `Name` has a specific role in the [MS-XAML] definition for declaring the identifiers that exist in an object graph output from a XAML source, whereas `Uid` has no specific role. 在現有實作 XAML 的架構使用.NET Framework XAML 服務，`Uid`通常用於當地語系化的目的。In the existing XAML-implementing frameworks that use .NET Framework XAML Services, `Uid` is typically used for localization purposes. 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.3.6](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.6](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property UnknownContent As XamlDirective
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ UnknownContent { System::Xaml::XamlDirective ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 XAML 中之 指示詞的 。

span.span: Gets a for the directive from XAML.

value.span: XAML 中之 指示詞的 。

span.span: A for the directive from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `UnknownContent` 這是一個預留位置，在 XAML 節點集，如果讀取器遇到未知的內容值節點中使用的指示詞或初始文字 （沒有可用的內建函式或文字語法可以將它轉換）。`UnknownContent` is a directive that is a placeholder to use in a XAML node set if a reader encounters unknown content for a value node or initialization text (no available intrinsic or text syntax can convert it). 如果您正在查看原始節點的解譯或視覺效果，`UnknownContent`有時候會出現在字串的形式`_UnknownContent`（請注意前置底線），且是在 XAML 語言 XAML 命名空間 (如表示前面`Namespace`節點)。If you are looking at raw node interpretations or visualizations, `UnknownContent` is sometimes seen in string form as `_UnknownContent` (note the leading underscore) and is within the XAML language XAML namespace (as notated by a preceding `Namespace` node).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Uri As XamlType
public: static property System::Xaml::XamlType ^ Uri { System::Xaml::XamlType ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 XAML 語言概念的 。

span.span: Gets a for the XAML language concept.

value.span: XAML 語言概念的 。

span.span: A for the XAML language concept.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段第 5.2.15](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.15](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525). `Uri` 不是 XAML 規格中指定，則為 true 的內建函式但因為它是常用的型別。`Uri` is not a true intrinsic but was specified in the XAML specification because it is a frequently used type. XAML 規格作者視為有用標準化衍生詞彙中的 XAML 表示法。The XAML specification authors considered it useful to standardize the XAML representation in derived vocabularies. 另請參閱[通用 XAML 語言基本類型的類型內建](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/built-in-types-for-common-xaml-language-primitives.md)。See also [Built-in Types for Common XAML Language Primitives](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/built-in-types-for-common-xaml-language-primitives.md).

summary.span: 取得字串的字串值，這個字串識別 XAML (2006) 語言命名空間。

span.span: Gets a string value for the string that identifies the XAML (2006) language namespace.

summary.span: 根據 [[MS-XAML] 第 5.1.1 節](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525) \(英文\) 中的定義，該命名空間對應至開頭為 XAML (2006) "x" 的命名空間。

span.span: That namespace corresponds to the XAML (2006) "x" prefixed namespace as defined in [[MS-XAML] Section 5.1.1](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
